name: Blizzard.js
description: A Node.js library for interacting with the Blizzard Community Platform API.

name: Discord.js
description: A Node.js library for interacting with the Discord API.

name: HLTV
description: A Node.js library for interacting with the HLTV API.

name: liquipediapy
description: A Python library for interacting with the Liquipedia API.

name: steam
description: A Python library for interacting with various parts of Steam.

name: valorant.js
description: A Node.js library for interacting with the VALORANT APIs used in game.

name: LoL in-house bot
description: A Discord bot handling role queue, matchmaking, and rankings for League of Legends in-house games.

name: awpy
description: A Python library for parsing, analyzing and visualizing CS:GO data.

name: Boxcars
description: A Rust library for parsing Rocket League replays.

name: Cassiopeia
description: A Python framework for interacting with and analyzing data from the Riot Games League of Legends API.

name: Clarity
description: A Java library for parsing CS:GO and Dota 2 replays.

name: demoinfocs-golang
description: A Go library for parsing and analyzing CS:GO demos (ie. replays.)

name: Rattletrap
description: A Haskell library for parsing and generating Rocket League replays.

name: brackets-manager.js
description: A JavaScript library to manage tournament brackets.

name: brackets-viewer.js
description: A JavaScript library to display tournament brackets.

name: Fortnite VSCode Theme
description: A Visual Studio Code theme inspired by Fornite.

name: BNETDocs
description: A documentation and discussion website for Blizzard and Battle.net protocols.

name: Rift Explorer
description: An automatically generated documentation of Riot Games LCU API.

name: valorant-api-docs
description: An automatically generated documentation of Valorant internal API.

name: Esport Team Logos
description: A database of Esports teams logos.

name: Boltobserv
description: An external Counter-Strike: Global Offensive radar for observers.

name: Open Dota
description: A website for Dota 2 esports stats.

name: LeagueDirector
description: A desktop application for staging and recording videos from League of Legends replays.

name: LeagueStats
description: A website for League of Legends summoners stats.
